alert.note: Alert for Collin (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 02 at 7:24PM CST until March 04 at 11:01AM CST by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Fort Worth TX has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Texas... East Fork Trinity River At McKinney affecting Collin County. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO LATE SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...East Fork Trinity River At McKinney. * WHEN...From late tonight to late Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Minor out of bank flooding will begin along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:30 PM CST Thursday the stage was 4.7 feet. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 16.5 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks.
